content: free pattern just in time for winter and christmas gift knits we love busting through all those beautiful single skeins of fingering weight yarn and this hat is the perfect way to do that you will be holding 3 strands of fingering weight yarn together in the ribbed beanie to make a hat that will fit pretty well every member of the family pictures shown here are the same hat on an 18 month old and a 30 something year old size 5 5mm us8 and 6 mm us 10 in your preferred method for knitting in the round this pattern is super easy to modify as you can cast on any even number of stitches you will just have to tweak the decreases to suit your stitch count we hope you enjoy this quick knit and for more patterns and our weekly youtube podcast you can find us on all the platforms as cozy up knits happy knitting
